news.item: After a rather long break where everyone has been busy with other things, we are finally back on SuperTux. The main goals of milestone 2 were discussed in an IRC meeting yesterday; the meeting log is available on the SuperTux wiki.
It looks like we have our first fansite. You can find it at SuperTux: The Fan Site. It includes game information, tips, cheats and more.
Better late than never. We now have a Mandrake RPM, Mac OS X binary and a BeOS package in our download section.
A SuperTux 0.1.2 RPM for RedHat, Fedora and ASP Linux is now available, as well as a Windows binary. You can get them from the download section. More packages are on there way.

SuperTux 0.1.2 has been released! It features 22 new levels from both the SuperTux team and contributors. You can wait for the various packages to be released or you can get the source tarball now. The new levels in SuperTux 0.1.2 can be found under the Bonus Levels menu.

A new SuperTux 0.1.1 Mac OS X binary is available that fixes a start-up crash in OS X 10.2. We also now have a SuperTux 0.1.1 Fedora Core 2 RPM available. As always, you can get them from our download section.
SuperTux 0.1.1 now has SuSE RPMs available. You can get them from our download section.
Supertux 0.1.1 now has binaries for Windows and Mac OS X 10.3.x as well as an autopackage installer in our download section.

SuperTux 0.1.1 is out, still the same game as 0.1.0, features however a much improved font, some minor bugfixes and finally a build in editor. A Win32 build is available as well, you can get it in the download section.
Windows Binary for SuperTux is released, go to the download section to download it.
SuperTux Milestone1, aka 0.1.0 has been released, featuring 26 levels, a worldmap and completly reworked graphics, go to the download section to download it.
